categories: Category:Sith of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: A male Sith served the Sith Emperor of the Sith Empire in 3950 BBY. Garbed in dark robes, the man was summoned to the Emperor's throne room in the Imperial Citadel to take evidence of Darth Nyriss's treachery from the Sith Lord Scourge.
